column4: Hi.. Wondering if anyone here has experience running Ubuntu as a guest OS with VMWare. I just installed fresh 10.04, vmware shared folders were working, then i ran all the ubuntu updates and shared folders stopped working.
I understand that there's a kernel module vmhgfs, and i'm not seeing it anymore
have you ran vmware-config-tools.pl after you updated?
not on a macbook but i have run ubuntu in vmware
